languages.text: {n}Губернатор, смертельно побледневший, гордо поднимает подбородок.{/n} "Арест?! Предоставление ресурсов? Ваши требования повредят подавлению бунта! И уж прошу простить, но обвинение в посягательстве на священную десятину..." {n}Он умолкает под гнетом безжалостного взгляда арбитра.{/n}

{n}Medineh, though deathly pale, proudly raises his chin.{/n} "Arrest me? Transfer my resources? Your demands undermine my efforts to suppress the rebellion! Excuse me, Proctor, but this accusation of stealing the sacred tithe is simply..." {n}He stops talking under the Arbitrator's oppressive, merciless gaze.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Губернатор, смертельно побледневший, гордо поднимает подбородок.{/n} "Арест?! Предоставление ресурсов? Ваши требования повредят подавлению бунта! И уж прошу простить, но обвинение в посягательстве на священную десятину..." {n}Он умолкает под гнетом безжалостного взгляда арбитра.{/n}

Excuse me, Proctor, but this accusation of stealing the sacred tithe is simply..." {n}He stops talking under the Arbitrator's oppressive, merciless gaze.{/n}

Excuse me, Proctor, but this accusation of stealing the sacred tithe is simply..." {n}He stops talking under the Arbitrator's oppressive, merciless gaze.{/n}

Excuse me, Proctor, but this accusation of stealing the sacred tithe is simply..." {n}He stops talking under the Arbitrator's oppressive, merciless gaze.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Medineh ist zwar leichenblass, hebt aber dennoch stolz das Kinn.{/n} "Mich verhaften? Meine Ressourcen abtreten? Eure Forderungen untergraben meine Bemühungen, die Rebellion niederzuschlagen! Bei allem Respekt, Proktor, der Vorwurf, ich hätte den heiligen Zehnt gestohlen, ist einfach ..." {n}Er verstummt angesichts der gnadenlosen Miene des Arbitrators.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Medineh, though deathly pale, proudly raises his chin.{/n} "Arrest me? Transfer my resources? Your demands undermine my efforts to suppress the rebellion! Excuse me, Proctor, but this accusation of stealing the sacred tithe is simply..." {n}He stops talking under the Arbitrator's oppressive, merciless gaze.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Medineh ist zwar leichenblass, hebt aber dennoch stolz das Kinn.{/n} "Mich verhaften? Meine Ressourcen abtreten? Eure Forderungen untergraben meine Bemühungen, die Rebellion niederzuschlagen! Bei allem Respekt, Proktor, der Vorwurf, ich hätte den heiligen Zehnt gestohlen, ist einfach ..." {n}Er verstummt angesichts der gnadenlosen Miene des Arbitrators.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Medineh, pâle comme un linge, relève fièrement le menton.{/n} « Une arrestation ? Le transfert de mes ressources ? Vos exigences sapent mes efforts visant à écraser la rébellion ! Veuillez m'excuser, proctor, mais cette accusation de vol de la dîme sacrée est tout simplement... » {n}dit-il avant de s'interrompre sous le regard oppressant et impitoyable de l'arbitrator.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Medineh, though deathly pale, proudly raises his chin.{/n} "Arrest me? Transfer my resources? Your demands undermine my efforts to suppress the rebellion! Excuse me, Proctor, but this accusation of stealing the sacred tithe is simply..." {n}He stops talking under the Arbitrator's oppressive, merciless gaze.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Medineh, pâle comme un linge, relève fièrement le menton.{/n} « Une arrestation ? Le transfert de mes ressources ? Vos exigences sapent mes efforts visant à écraser la rébellion ! Veuillez m'excuser, proctor, mais cette accusation de vol de la dîme sacrée est tout simplement... » {n}dit-il avant de s'interrompre sous le regard oppressant et impitoyable de l'arbitrator.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Aunque tiene el rostro lívido, Medineh levanta orgullosamente la barbilla.{/n} «¿Arrestarme? ¿Ceder mis recursos? ¡Sus exigencias menoscaban mis esfuerzos por sofocar la rebelión! Discúlpeme, Procurador, pero acusarme de haber robado el sagrado diezmo es simplemente...». {n}Las palabras mueren en sus labios bajo la severa e implacable mirada del Arbitrator.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Medineh, though deathly pale, proudly raises his chin.{/n} "Arrest me? Transfer my resources? Your demands undermine my efforts to suppress the rebellion! Excuse me, Proctor, but this accusation of stealing the sacred tithe is simply..." {n}He stops talking under the Arbitrator's oppressive, merciless gaze.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Aunque tiene el rostro lívido, Medineh levanta orgullosamente la barbilla.{/n} «¿Arrestarme? ¿Ceder mis recursos? ¡Sus exigencias menoscaban mis esfuerzos por sofocar la rebelión! Discúlpeme, Procurador, pero acusarme de haber robado el sagrado diezmo es simplemente...». {n}Las palabras mueren en sus labios bajo la severa e implacable mirada del Arbitrator.{/n}

languages.text: {n}梅迪涅总督尽管脸色惨白，但依然高傲地扬起了下巴。{/n}“你要逮捕我？还要我移交资源？你这是在妨碍我镇压叛乱！不好意思，监察官，你居然指控我盗窃神圣的什一税，这样的指控实在是……”{n}然而，在索罗蒙充满压迫感的注视之下，梅迪涅渐渐闭了嘴。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Medineh, though deathly pale, proudly raises his chin.{/n} "Arrest me? Transfer my resources? Your demands undermine my efforts to suppress the rebellion! Excuse me, Proctor, but this accusation of stealing the sacred tithe is simply..." {n}He stops talking under the Arbitrator's oppressive, merciless gaze.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}梅迪涅总督尽管脸色惨白，但依然高傲地扬起了下巴。{/n}“你要逮捕我？还要我移交资源？你这是在妨碍我镇压叛乱！不好意思，监察官，你居然指控我盗窃神圣的什一税，这样的指控实在是……”{n}然而，在索罗蒙充满压迫感的注视之下，梅迪涅渐渐闭了嘴。{/n}

languages.text: {n}死にそうなほど青ざめながらも、メディネは気丈に顎を持ち上げた。{/n}「逮捕だと？私の資源を引き渡せというのか？その要求は、反乱を抑えようとしている私の努力を妨げるものだぞ！代理人。失礼ながら、神聖なる租税を盗んだという告発は、あまりにも…」{n}アービトレイターの威圧的で冷酷な眼差しに射すくめられ、彼は口を閉ざした。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Medineh, though deathly pale, proudly raises his chin.{/n} "Arrest me? Transfer my resources? Your demands undermine my efforts to suppress the rebellion! Excuse me, Proctor, but this accusation of stealing the sacred tithe is simply..." {n}He stops talking under the Arbitrator's oppressive, merciless gaze.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}死にそうなほど青ざめながらも、メディネは気丈に顎を持ち上げた。{/n}「逮捕だと？私の資源を引き渡せというのか？その要求は、反乱を抑えようとしている私の努力を妨げるものだぞ！代理人。失礼ながら、神聖なる租税を盗んだという告発は、あまりにも…」{n}アービトレイターの威圧的で冷酷な眼差しに射すくめられ、彼は口を閉ざした。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Soluk benziyle bir ölüyü andıran Medineh, gururlu bir tavırla çenesini kaldırıyor.{/n} "Beni mi tutuklayacaksınız? Kaynaklarıma el mi koyacaksınız? Bu taleplerinizle isyanı bastırma çabalarımı görmezden geliyorsunuz! Kusura bakmayın Üsteğmen ancak beni kutsal aşarı çalmakla suçlamanız yalnızca..." {n}Medineh, Yargıcı'nın kasvetli ve acımasız bakışları altında ezilerek konuşmaya devam edemiyor.{/n}

Excuse me, Proctor, but this accusation of stealing the sacred tithe is simply..." {n}He stops talking under the Arbitrator's oppressive, merciless gaze.{/n}

Bu taleplerinizle isyanı bastırma çabalarımı görmezden geliyorsunuz! Kusura bakmayın Üsteğmen ancak beni kutsal aşarı çalmakla suçlamanız yalnızca..." {n}Medineh, Yargıcı'nın kasvetli ve acımasız bakışları altında ezilerek konuşmaya devam edemiyor.{/n}
